title: That's our baby: a film about prepared childbirth
creator_credit: Lawren Productions, Jack Agins and Carrie Agins
brief_description: Uses the example of the filmmaker, his wife, and their first child in order to demonstrate the techniques and principles of Lamaze training in childbirth.
